actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the National Housing Act for the purpose of providing mortgage insurance for buildings used by commercial establishments.

summary.text: Amends the National Housing Act to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to insure mortgages for rehabilitated or newly constructed buildings used by commercial establishments.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Housing Act for the purpose of providing mortgage insurance for buildings used by commercial establishments.
